name: Hue Nam Dong Biking Tour 1Day
description: Start at hotel at 8 and shuttle along Highway One to La Son Crossroads. Get on your bike to face the challenge of 40km uphill riding. Enjoy the mountainous landscape on both sides of the road. You take a look at the Katu people going about their daily life: women and children having their baths in the babbling streams, carrying their firewood on their back baskets, patiently tilling their rocky gardens.
